happy: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
Smile — it increases your face value.
Joy is not in things; it is in us.
sad: Every storm runs out of rain.
Tears come from the heart, not the brain.
Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
angry: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
Anger is one letter short of danger.
tired: Rest when you’re weary. Refresh and renew yourself.
motivated: Dream big and dare to fail.
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
